translation.en: If you're watching this, then I'm not around anymore.
translation.es: Si estás viendo esto, entonces ya no estoy aquí.

translation.en: I couldn't say any of this to your face. It's too embarrassing.
translation.es: No pude decirte esto de frente. Es muy vergonzoso.

translation.en: For you, not for me, obviously.
translation.es: Para ti, no para mí obviamente.

translation.en: You're never very good at hearing how lovely you are.
translation.es: No te gusta que te digan que eres bueno.

translation.en: But you are. You are. You're lovely.
But you're absolutely fucking useless.
So I thought I'd leave you a little guide to life without me.
translation.es: Así que te dejé una guía para vivir sin mí.

translation.en: You've gotta turn the alarm off in the morning, yeah?
translation.es: Tienes que apagar la alarma en la mañana.

translation.en: If you open the door, it'll set it off, then the alarm company think we're getting broken into.
translation.es: Si abres la puerta, se activará y la compañía creerá que sucedió algo.

translation.en: If you do set it off, you've gotta ring 'em.
translation.es: Si se activa, tendrás que llamarlos.

translation.en: The number's in your phone under alarm. The alarm code is 8645.
translation.es: El número está como alarma. El código es ocho, seis, cuatro, cinco.

translation.en: That's your PIN code.
You know this.
And... put it on perimeter, otherwise the dog will set it off.
translation.es: Colócala en perímetro o la perra la activará.

translation.en: And feed the dog, yeah?
First thing in the morning and when you get in from work.
translation.es: Al levantarte y al llegar del trabajo.

translation.en: - And what else? -
Gotta put the bins out Tuesday evenings.
translation.es: Saca la basura los martes en la tarde.

translation.en: Black bin is household waste, green bin is recy--
translation.es: El negro es de basura normal, el verde es para reciclar...

translation.en: ♪ When I wake up in the morning, love ♪
♪ And I know it's gonna be ♪
♪ A lovely day ♪
Where's your bowl?
There it is.
Oh, fuck!
- No dog food. -
Baked beans or vegetable curry?
Thought so.
Oh, sorry.
- I'll get you some real food later. -
Fuckin' hell.
Vegetable curry for me then.
translation.es: Entonces yo me como el curry.

translation.en: - Hello. - Hello.
Um, I'm starting here today.
I'm starting work here today.
Okay. Do you have a name?
Yes. Sandy.
No, I mean, who are you meant to meet here?
translation.es: No, me refiero a quién vienes a ver.

translation.en: Who hired you?
Oh. Mr. Braden.
Come here. Good girl.
Your dog should be on a lead.
- What? - Dogs should be on a lead.
Can't you read? The park's for everyone.
translation.es: ¿No lee? El parque es para todos.

translation.en: All right. Oh, sorry. Thank you. Come here, girl.
Come here.
What?! He is not a fat, hairy, nosy cocksucker.
translation.es: ¿Qué? Él no es un mamón gordo, peludo y metiche.

translation.en: Bad girl, Brandy.
Sorry about that.
- Disgusting. - See you later.
Good girl.
Right.
I've gotta go to work.
See you later.
I'll bring you some food.
Good girl. Good girl. Good girl.
Here you go.
What?
It's your post.
Put it through the door.
Well, you're here, so it saves me a trip.
translation.es: Si lo recibe, no tengo que ir.

translation.en: - I don't wanna walk with it, do I? - Why not?
translation.es: - No me lo quiero llevar. - ¿Por qué no?

translation.en: You're new, aren't you?
Yeah, I was transferred-- No, I don't care.
translation.es: - Sí, me transfirieron... - No me importa.

translation.en: Presumably in your old round, you put things through the door, didn't you?
translation.es: Quizás en tus otras rondas dejabas los sobres en las casas, ¿no?

translation.en: Mate, there's no need to get lairy.
translation.es: No hace falta que se enoje.

translation.en: - Why are you talking to me like this? - You gonna report me?
translation.es: ¿Por qué me hablas así? - ¿Me denunciarás? - Sí.

translation.en: Yeah. What's your name?
You'll laugh.
Trust me.
It's Pat.
Postman Pat?
Put it through the door.
That was easy, wasn't it?
- You could've done that. - No, I couldn't.
- Why not? - I'm not a postman.
Go on.
Hi, George.
Hi.
Who's that?
He's my uncle.
Pedo!
- What? - Pedo!
I'm not a pedo.
And if I was, you'd be safe, you tubby little ginger cunt.
translation.es: De serlo, tú estarías seguro, tonto regordete.

translation.en: Welcome. Great to have you.
translation.es: Bienvenida. Qué bueno que estés aquí.

translation.en: I remember my first day, and it is exciting, isn't it?
translation.es: Recuerdo mi primer día y es maravilloso, ¿no?

translation.en: - Yeah. - Yeah. Great place to work, this.
translation.es: - Sí. - Es un gran lugar para trabajar.

translation.en: Very dynamic, lots of people in and out all the time.
translation.es: Muy dinámico, con mucha gente que entra y sale.

translation.en: Really excellent bunch of people.
Hard working.
It's very rewarding as well. You get to go out into the community.
translation.es: Es muy reconfortante. Podrás conocer a la comunidad.

translation.en: And that can be anything from local stories, you know,
um... entertainment, finance.
So, yeah.
Kath does the advertising.
Be nice to her, and she might take you to the opening of a new restaurant, give you a free meal.
translation.es: Si la tratas bien quizás te lleve a la apertura de un restaurante.

translation.en: Lenny does all the photography,
so if you're interested in that...
Everyone chips in on everything, really.
So what kind of thing are you interested in, would you say?
translation.es: ¿Qué es lo que más te interesa a ti?

translation.en: Um, writing features.
Perfect. That's great.
You'll definitely do that here.
translation.es: Eso es lo que harás aquí.

translation.en: Lots of features. Sky's the limit.
Tony's the head of features.
He's not here.
He's a very good writer. Very smart, very experienced, good guy. Um...
translation.es: Es muy buen escritor. Muy inteligente y experimentado.

translation.en: He's not himself at the minute, to be honest.
translation.es: No está pasando por un buen momento.

translation.en: He's had a bit of bad news. Um...
His, er... Tony's my brother- in- law.
Um, he was married to my sister, Lisa,
translation.es: Estaba casado con Lisa, mi hermana...

translation.en: who died.
Cancer.
- Sorry. - Yeah.
And he was obviously devastated.
Er, suicidal.
Right.
I should warn you, he might...
say a few things that are a bit...
brutal...
at times, so, you know, don't take it personally.
translation.es: ...a veces. No lo tomes a pecho.

translation.en: I mean, you will be working closely with him.
Anyway, er... - have fun. -
Thanks.
So, how are you?
Same.
Bad then?
I've honestly nothing to compare it to anymore.
translation.es: Ya no tengo con qué compararlo.

translation.en: But I guess a good day is when I don't go around
translation.es: Pero supongo que es un buen día si no voy por ahí

translation.en: wanting to shoot random strangers in the face
translation.es: queriendo dispararle a extraños en el rostro

translation.en: and then turn the gun on myself.
One of my clients
fantasizes about killing his ex- wife...
...when he's masturbating.
- Why are you telling me that? - I didn't say his name.
translation.es: ¿Por qué me lo dice? No dije su nombre.

translation.en: No, I know, but... how does that help me?
translation.es: No, ya sé. ¿Pero en qué ayuda eso?

translation.en: I dunno.
I guess to let you know you're not the only one.
translation.es: Para que sepas que no eres el único, supongo.

translation.en: Only what?
Well, the only mental case out there.
I mean, you know...
the only guy with mental problems.
- I've got problems. - Go on.
God, man, where do I start?
Maybe start with me, as I'm paying, but...
translation.es: Quizás por mí que soy el que paga, pero...

translation.en: - Morning. - Morning.
Terrible, isn't it? Scarred for life.
Hardly scarred for life.
She's 93.
If she lives to 100, she's only been scarred for seven percent of her life.
translation.es: Si vive hasta los 100, el trauma sería por un 7 % de su vida. MUJER DE 93 ASALTADA

translation.en: You're late.
You're boring.
You're joking, aren't you? I wasn't, but go on. What have you got?
translation.es: - Es una broma, ¿no? - No, pero, ¿qué dices?

translation.en: It's distribution day.
No, I mean, why would you think I was joking about you being boring?
translation.es: No, ¿por qué piensas que bromeé con lo de ser aburrida?

translation.en: Have you got a... counterargument or...
- Why do you let him get away with this? - I don't.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué dejas que haga esto? - No lo dejo...

translation.en: Tony, come on. What's going on?
Er, we're putting out a free local newspaper
translation.es: Publicamos un periódico gratuito que a nadie le importa.

translation.en: - that no one cares about. - No, that's... That's not true.
translation.es: Publicamos un periódico gratuito que a nadie le importa. No es cierto.

translation.en: And that's not what... Can you come in my office?
translation.es: No me... ¿Puedes venir a mi oficina?

translation.en: Sure.
A lot of people rely on our paper. Not everyone's on Twitter, are they?
translation.es: Muchos leen nuestro periódico. No todos ven Twitter, ¿no?

translation.en: Back to work, everyone.
What do you want me to say?
That I'm sorry, and I'll buck my ideas up? 'Cause I won't. 'Cause there's no point.
translation.es: ¿Que lo lamento y me esforzaré más? No lo haré. No tiene sentido.

translation.en: Look, Tony, I know that you've had issues,
- okay, since you lost Lisa. - Do you reckon...
my wife dying affected me a bit?
translation.es: ...que perder a mi esposa me afectó?

translation.en: Of course, and, you know, I get that. I even told Sandy about it.
translation.es: Claro y sabes que lo entiendo. Hasta se lo dije a Sandy.

translation.en: Who's Sandy?
The new girl. I didn't want her thinking this place was a madhouse.
translation.es: La chica nueva. Podría pensar que estamos locos.

translation.en: I had to say something.
Look, I just need a bit of professionalism around here, okay, Tony.
translation.es: Necesito un poco de profesionalismo, Tony.

translation.en: - Please? - No.
I shouldn't have to explain this to you.
You can't just go around being rude to people.
translation.es: - No puedes ser grosero con la gente. - Sí puedo.

translation.en: That's the beauty of it.
There's no advantage to being nice and thoughtful
translation.es: No tiene sentido ser bueno, considerado,

translation.en: and caring and having integrity.
It's a disadvantage, if anything.
translation.es: - Es una desventaja. - Veremos, porque, si sigues así,

translation.en: Let's see. If you carry on like this, I might have to let you go.
translation.es: - Es una desventaja. - Veremos, porque, si sigues así, tendré que despedirte.

translation.en: No, you won't.
You won't, that's what I'm saying, 'cause you're a nice bloke.
translation.es: Eso digo. Eres un buen tipo.

translation.en: So I'll take advantage of you, like everyone else does here.
translation.es: Así que me aprovecharé de ti, como todos.

translation.en: - You'll warn me. I'll ignore it. - What?
You'll give me another warning. I'll ignore it.
translation.es: Me advertirás de nuevo y te ignoraré.

translation.en: I'll carry on doing what the fuck I want.
translation.es: Y seguiré haciendo lo que quiera.

translation.en: Eventually, you'll give up, and I'll win.
The girls here have discovered
that you won't even question women's problems.
translation.es: que ni siquiera cuestionas los problemas femeninos.

translation.en: Kath's had three periods this month. She likes Fridays off. You do nothing.
translation.es: Kath tuvo el período tres veces este mes. Se toma los viernes y no haces nada.

translation.en: She gets away with it 'cause she's an arsehole.
translation.es: Hace lo que quiere, porque es una imbécil.

translation.en: So, I thought, right, let's have a bit of that.
translation.es: Así que pensé en hacer lo mismo.

translation.en: Why would you wanna do that? Why wouldn't you just rather get better and be happy?

translation.en: There's only one thing that'd make me better and happy,

translation.en: and that's Lisa being around, and that can't happen.

translation.en: So that's why I nearly killed myself straight away.

translation.en: Right, okay, but you didn't kill yourself, did you?
So, clearly, you know, something made you stop.
The look on the dog's face.
She was hungry, so I thought I'd better feed her.

translation.en: It gave me time to think, I should be dead now.

translation.en: I didn't care.
So, everything's a bonus.

and I do and say what the fuck I want

translation.en: for as long as I want,
and then when it all gets too much, I can always kill myself.

translation.en: It's like a superpower.
That's the worst superhero I've ever heard of.

translation.en: That's the way it is now.
So what? So...
My job now is to make you happy before you kill yourself?

translation.en: That's like a constant ticking clock for me now, is it?

translation.en: If you like.
Well, I don't like.
Anyway, that's the way it is.
Okay, well, I'm glad we had this chat.

All right, um...

She's just started today. It's her first day, um, so, Tony,

We're a disgusting, narcissistic, selfish parasite,

I could do it now. Quite happily just go upstairs,

I've gotta go.
Want me to bring you more doughnuts, fat boy?
Yes, please.
Do you mind him talking to you like that?

It distracts him.
You don't take any shit off him, all right?

translation.en: - Er, Julian? - Yeah.
Um, we've had a couple of calls from people saying that their building didn't get any papers delivered.

translation.en: Ah. Okay, look, that's weird 'cause I definitely delivered them all.

A lot of the old people can't get up and down the stairs or go out.

translation.en: Yeah, I know that, boss. I will be extra careful with these.

translation.en: Okay.
Um, can I get paid now?
You will do a good job, won't you? You can trust me, yeah.

All right.  Okay.
Hot date?

Hi.

but I have spoken to loads of 'em over the last few months,

But then, five... I mean,
I bet that's never happened before.
translation.es: Apuesto a que eso nunca ocurrió.

translation.en: Not on record anyway.
- Are you taking notes? - Yeah, all in there.
Is this going to be in next week's newspaper?
Yeah, we'll rush this through.
Quite a scoop.
Oh, my Denise would be tickled by this.
That's my wife.
She passed away last year.
Light of my life.
Anything that happens, I go to tell her.
translation.es: Siempre pienso en contarle lo que me pasa

translation.en: Then I remember.
Nothing's as good if you don't share it.
translation.es: No es tan bueno si no lo compartes.

translation.en: Still have my downs,
but then life throws you these interesting little things, doesn't it?
translation.es: pero luego la vida me ofrece estas interesantes pequeñeces.

translation.en: You can't feel sorry for yourself.
Got to keep going.
Happy birthday.
Oh. Thanks.
Fuck's sake.
Excuse me. Where's the dog food?
translation.es: Disculpe. ¿Dónde está la comida para perros?

translation.en: It's by the cat food.
Right, well...
I've got another question then.
Where's the cat food?
Tinned products, aisle two.
Cheers. Don't get up.
Okay.
- That everything? - Yeah.
All right, mate. You got any money?
- Yeah. - What?
Yes, I've got money.
Give it to me then.
- Why? - I'll fuckin' kill you if you don't.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué? - Porque te mataré si no lo haces.

translation.en: Does that usually work, does it?
To most people,
the threat of death is worse than giving you money,
translation.es: la amenaza de muerte es peor que darles dinero,

translation.en: but...
Or they're worried you'll hurt their family or...
translation.es: O temen que lastimen a su familia o...

translation.en: I haven't got any family.
So, I'm not gonna go into it, but I don't care about anything anymore.
translation.es: Así que ya no me importa nada.

translation.en: I'm not giving you any money.
Are you mental?
No, I'm just tired of doing things I don't wanna do,
translation.es: No, cansado de hacer las cosas que no quiero hacer.

translation.en: and we always have a choice. And if I've read this right,
translation.es: Siempre tenemos una opción y si entendí bien,

translation.en: my choice is either violence
or hand over my money peacefully...
to two useless little cunts.
- Are you mad?  - No.
- Fuck off! Okay? -
Just... fuck off.
There you go.
It's no one's fault what's happened.
translation.es: Nadie tiene la culpa de que pasó.

translation.en: Don't go blaming the world.
You know how grumpy you get when things don't go your way.
translation.es: Te enfadas mucho si las cosas no salen como quieres.

translation.en: But you've got such a good heart.
You're born like it. You can't contrive it. You're just decent.
translation.es: Naciste así. No puedes contenerlo. Eres decente.

translation.en: I knew it, first time I met you.
Hit me like a bolt of lightning.
translation.es: Fue como si me cayera un rayo.

translation.en: And I've loved you ever since.
translation.es: Y te he amado desde entonces.

translation.en: You fat twat!
Oh, it's Sunday, you cunt!
You're not a real vicar, I can tell.
translation.es: Se nota que no eres un pastor.

translation.en: Oh, Tony!
Oh my God!
- What? - Why'd you do this to me?
It's good for you. It gets your heart going.
translation.es: Te hace bien, te acelera el corazón

translation.en: - It gets your metabolism up. - No! You...
